Interface RemoteAggregator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.environment.Namable, Prosumer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteAdapterImpl

    public interface RemoteAggregator
extends Prosumer
    Specific interface for remote aggregator, same functionality as Aggregator but with serialisable ActorRefs.
    Author:
    syl
